s0189.chinese: 收天下兵，聚之咸陽，銷以為鐘鐻，金人十二，重各千石，置廷宮中。
s0189.literal: He collected all weapons from throughout the land, gathered them at Xianyang, melted them to make bells, bell stands, and twelve metal statues, each weighing a thousand shi, and placed them in the palace courtyard.
s0189.idiomatic: He collected all weapons from throughout the land, gathered them at Xianyang, melted them to make bells, bell stands, and twelve metal statues, each weighing a thousand shi, and placed them in the palace courtyard.

s0190.literal: He unified laws, regulations, weights, and measures.
s0190.idiomatic: He unified laws, regulations, weights, and measures.

s0193.chinese: 地東至海暨朝鮮，西至臨洮、羌中，南至北向戶，北據河為塞，并陰山至遼東。
s0193.literal: Territory extended east to the sea and Chaoxian, west to Lintao and the Qiang region, south to Beixianghu, north occupying the Yellow River as a barrier, and along the Yin Mountains to Liaodong.
s0193.idiomatic: Territory extended east to the sea and Chaoxian, west to Lintao and the Qiang region, south to Beixianghu, north occupying the Yellow River as a barrier, and along the Yin Mountains to Liaodong.

s0194.chinese: 徙天下豪富於咸陽十二萬戶。
s0194.literal: He relocated the wealthy and powerful families from throughout the land to Xianyang—one hundred twenty thousand households.
s0194.idiomatic: He relocated the wealthy and powerful families from throughout the land to Xianyang—one hundred twenty thousand households.
